warnAlertDetails.alertDescription: Warning Root Mount on Linux. v1
warnAlertDetails.query: Perf | where CounterName has '% used space' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer)) | where Computer !startswith 'hn'and Computer !startswith 'wn' and Computer !startswith 'zk' and Computer !startswith 'k8s' and Computer !startswith 'aks' | where ObjectName has 'Logical Disk' and CounterName has '% used space' and InstanceName == '/' | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue | summarize PercentUsed=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Computer, InstanceName | project Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed | where PercentUsed >= 90 | join (Perf | where CounterName has 'free megabytes' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer)))on InstanceName, Computer | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue, PercentUsed | summarize averageGigabytesFree=round((avg(CounterValue)/1024),2) by Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed | project Computer, InstanceName, averageGigabytesFree, PercentUsed | where averageGigabytesFree between (11 .. 20)

warnAlertDetails.alertDescription: Warning Data Mount Alert on Linux. v1
warnAlertDetails.query: Perf | where CounterName has '% used space' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer)) | where Computer !startswith 'hn'and Computer !startswith 'wn' and Computer !startswith 'zk' and Computer !startswith 'k8s' and Computer !startswith 'aks' | where InstanceName !has '_total' and InstanceName !contains '/mnt/resource' and InstanceName != '/' | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue | summarize PercentUsed=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Computer, InstanceName | project Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed | where PercentUsed >= 95 | join (Perf | where CounterName has 'free megabytes' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer)))on InstanceName, Computer | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue, PercentUsed | summarize averageGigabytesFree=round((avg(CounterValue)/1024),2) by Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed | project Computer, InstanceName, averageGigabytesFree, PercentUsed | where averageGigabytesFree between (11 .. 20)
